rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: An open space with a decorative archway and traditional wood finish. Vastu guidelines ensure the entrance faces east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open living area with high ceilings, designed for joint family gatherings; includes a bay window and French doors to the garden area. Vastu recommends placement in the south-eastern corner.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for communal dining; features a traditional Indian design with modern elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest bedroom ensuring privacy. Vastu principles place it in north-western section of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom; positioned to maximize natural light per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the dining area. Designed for joint family use with ample storage. Vastu suggests positioning it in the north-eastern corner of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Guest bathroom placed near the guest bedroom for convenience; adheres to local building norms.
